channel.title: Have some free hosting because I love you
channel.description:
Well, sort of. Actually I just need people to use it before I open the floodgates. Beta testing if you will.
If you're going to sign up, make sure: * You actually use it, free accounts are limited in number. * You don't breach the TOS, note the part about no cheating related activity, sorry. * You report any bugs or issue you find to me (drop an email to support@bitdash.com)
https://www.bitdash.com/billing/cart.php
Use the "Simple 1" package with the code "MOPARORNOCAR" (hi mopar :>) to get 100% off for life. Requires a domain, though, either registered through me or just one you already own.

item.title: Have some free hosting because I love you
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:32, topic:398926”]Heh, sorry. I want to use a datacentre in East Anglia, ie, local to me.

RackSrv have one in the Kent Science Park.[/quote]Well, obviously if you get a big enough user base, you could buy more servers in other datacenters around the world.

Read full topic
item.source: Have some free hosting because I love you

item.title: Have some free hosting because I love you
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:28, topic:398926”]It wasn’t that I stopped paying for it, it was that it never launched. As people on IRC know there is shit going on in my personal life at the moment, and the guy who is funding all of this decided he wasn’t comfortable going ahead until things were smoothed out and more stable. Sorry to all the free accounts that didn’t get a very long ride, but it is what it is.

@cumescape: I denied your order because you had things on there that weren’t included under the free account (dedicated IP) and did not pay the invoice. It’s probably a good job you didn’t all things considered, though if you or anyone else had you would still be receiving service.[/quote]Will BitDash be back sometime soon??

Read full topic
item.source: Have some free hosting because I love you

item.title: Have some free hosting because I love you
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

It wasn’t that I stopped paying for it, it was that it never launched. As people on IRC know there is shit going on in my personal life at the moment, and the guy who is funding all of this decided he wasn’t comfortable going ahead until things were smoothed out and more stable. Sorry to all the free accounts that didn’t get a very long ride, but it is what it is.

@cumescape: I denied your order because you had things on there that weren’t included under the free account (dedicated IP) and did not pay the invoice. It’s probably a good job you didn’t all things considered, though if you or anyone else had you would still be receiving service.

Read full topic
item.source: Have some free hosting because I love you
